channel.title: Reverse-Engineering on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Reverse-Engineering on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Messing around with a Bluetooth printer
item.description: I recently acquired one of these thermal printers to be able to print small labels quickly. And since I didn’t find any open source alternative that would work for me, I wanted to try to do my own program as a fun challenge.

item.title: Cat Printer BLE
item.description: This is a command line program that provides basic functionality to use one of the most recent models (as of March 2025) of Cat Printers: model MXW01.
